# Favorite Journals

\*\*Academic Journals\*\* starting with

[SCOUPS]([https://www.scopus.com/)](https://www.scopus.com/)) that typically directs me to

[\*Nature\*]([https://www.nature.com/),](https://www.nature.com/),)

[\*Science\*]([https://www.science.org/),](https://www.science.org/),)

[\*Nature Medicine\*]([https://www.nature.com/nm/),](https://www.nature.com/nm/),)

[\*Science Translational Medicine\*]([https://www.science.org/journal/stm)](https://www.science.org/journal/stm))

\*\*Laboratory methods\*\* in

[\*Nature Methods\*]([https://www.nature.com/nmeth/),](https://www.nature.com/nmeth/),)

[\*Nature Protocols\*]([https://www.nature.com/nprot/),](https://www.nature.com/nprot/),) and

[Springer\|Nature Experiments]([https://experiments.springernature.com/)](https://experiments.springernature.com/))

\*\*Cellular, Molecular Biology\*\* in

[Bruce Albert's 'Molecular Biology of the Cell']([https://brucealberts.ucsf.edu/current-projects/molecular-biology-of-the-cell/)](https://brucealberts.ucsf.edu/current-projects/molecular-biology-of-the-cell/))

[\*Nature Reviews Molecular Cell Biology\*]([https://www.nature.com/nrm/),](https://www.nature.com/nrm/),)

[\*Cell Press\*]([https://www.cell.com/),](https://www.cell.com/),)

[\*Science Signaling\*]([https://www.science.org/journal/signaling)](https://www.science.org/journal/signaling))

[Terry Kenakin's 'A Pharmacology Primer']([https://www.sciencedirect.com/book/9780128139578/a-pharmacology-primer),](https://www.sciencedirect.com/book/9780128139578/a-pharmacology-primer),)

\*\*Clinical microbiology, metagenomics and microbial ecology (microbiome sciences)\*\* in

[Principles of Virology]([https://www.amazon.com/Principles-Virology-Multi-ASM-Books/dp/1683670329/)](https://www.amazon.com/Principles-Virology-Multi-ASM-Books/dp/1683670329/))

[\*Nature Reviews Microbiology\*]([https://www.nature.com/nrmicro/),](https://www.nature.com/nrmicro/),)
